text: often times the tendency is to think
about con adoption as a technology
project and the reality is it's it's
transformative across the entire
organization there will be implications
and there will be impact oftentimes
positively but it's important to be
intentional and to go into it with a
plan around how you're going to speak to
your people how you're going to present
that message of how they're going to
contribute to this process and what
their value add is going to be and to
not consider that once the project is
already kicked off and communications
have been sent out and there's confusion
and and potentially resistance the more
intentional you can be up front the
better
[Music]
